description: Delve into all the datasets available on Youth Data Lab. Download the open data to use in your research projects, or provide a youth-oriented lens for your organization’s existing insights.
index: Indexes are value-based datasets for data that is quantifiable; for example, minimum wage has a value in each city that we can measure
survey: Survey datasets include responses to Youthful Cities’ questionnaires, which provide greater insight into the quantifiable data.
interview: Interview datasets contain quotes from participants and are useful for understanding the context of insights.
